Your hero is always keen to explore, and: Your hero is always keen to explore, and will be happy to share his findings with you if you give him the order to go on an adventure.
This page is still under development: This page is still under development
Browse and bid on hero items using silve: Browse and bid on hero items using silver. Find equipment or consumables that fit your needs.
Head: Head
List your hero items for others to bid o: List your hero items for others to bid on. Turn unused gear or consumables into silver.
Review your recent auctions — see what y: Review your recent auctions — see what you’ve bought, sold, and how much silver was exchanged.
Auctions are used to buy and sell hero i: Auctions are used to buy and sell hero items with silver. They’re a reliable way to obtain useful equipment or consumables when you need them.
Ability points can be used to improve yo: Ability points can be used to improve your hero. Hero starts their journey with 4 ability points. Each time a hero gains a level they earn 4 additional ability points that can be used to increase any of the four abilities. Each ability can only be increased a hundred times.
Your hero's equipment will give you adva: Your hero's equipment will give you advantages that will help you outperform your opponents. You may change your hero’s equipment whenever your hero is not travelling. Items that affect villages or buildings apply to the village the hero is currently assigned to.
The Hero is your strongest unit. It can: The Hero is your strongest unit. It can be improved and equipped with powerful items. The Hero does not need to be researched or trained and is available from the start. The hero can attack or defend like other units, but is the only one who can go on adventures for loot and conquer oases for bonus resources.
This oasis is occupied by you and is pro: This oasis is occupied by you and is producing resources for village {{villageName}}.
This oasis is occupied by another player: This oasis is occupied by another player. You can raid it, but doing so may trigger retaliations.
This is an occupiable oasis. You can occ: This is an occupiable oasis. You can occupy this oasis by upgrading {{herosMansion}} to levels 10, 15 or 20.
You can establish a new village on this: You can establish a new village on this tile. To settle it, make sure you have 3 settlers and an unused expansion slot from one of your villages.
Settlers are already on route to this lo: Settlers are already on route to this location
This village belongs to another player. You may trade with it or attack it. Beware though, attacking may provoke retaliation!
You need to build the {{buildingName}} b: You need to build the {{buildingName}} before you can train troops.
Village overview allows you to track act: Village overview allows you to track active troop training, smithy and academy queues, monitor merchant availability and movements and track ongoing celebrations.
You need to build the {{buildingName}} b: You need to build the {{buildingName}} before you can start research.
You need to build the {{buildingName}} before you can improve troops.
You need to build the {{buildingName}} before you can dispatch merchants.

You need to build the {{buildingName}} b: You need to build the {{buildingName}} before you can organize celebrations.
Select whether enemies can trigger attac: Select whether enemies can trigger attacks against you while you're offline.
While in vacation mode, game pauses comp: While in vacation mode, game pauses completely. You may enable vacation mode or resume gameplay at any time.
Select a light or dark theme for the int: Select a light or dark theme for the interface appearance.
Select a daytime or nighttime setting to: Select a daytime or nighttime setting to adjust the overall visual atmosphere.
Enables accessibility enhancements for b: Enables accessibility enhancements for better usability.
Disables certain animations and effects: Disables certain animations and effects for a smoother experience.
Shows the names of buildings on village: Shows the names of buildings on village and resources views.
Enable automatic navigation to resources: Enable automatic navigation to resources or village views after starting a building upgrade or downgrade
Enables instant building of buildings an: Enables instant building of buildings and troops with no cost.
Notifications are not available on your: Notifications are not available on your device.
You've blocked notifications for this si: You've blocked notifications for this site. To receive alerts, you'll need to re-enable them in your browser settings.
You've not yet enabled notifications for: You've not yet enabled notifications for this site. To receive alerts, you'll need to enable them by clicking on the "Enable notifications" button.
Enable notification on building upgrade: Enable notification on building upgrade completion
Enable notification on Smithy unit upgra: Enable notification on Smithy unit upgrade completion
Enable notification on Academy research: Enable notification on Academy research completion
This is a categorized overview of availa: This is a categorized overview of available quests. Quests are divided into village-specific and global tasks, each with multiple levels to complete. Rewards vary from resources, hero experience, troops and hero items. Reward is added immediately on collection.
These quests are tied to the current vil: These quests are tied to the current village and can only be progressed in current village.
These quests are not tied to any village: These quests are not tied to any village and are progress in all villages.
This is a categorized view of archived r: This is a categorized view of archived reports. These reports are not deleted once a limit is reached and you can have an unlimited amount of them. You can toggle different types of reports by using report filters below.
This is a categorized view of in-game re: This is a categorized view of in-game reports for current village. You can toggle different types of reports by using report filters below.
This is a categorized view of in-game reports. You can toggle different types of reports by using report filters below.
Building is not fully implemented, some: Building is not fully implemented, some functionality may be missing.
To be able to train stronger units, you: To be able to train stronger units, you will need to do research in your academy. The more this building is upgraded, the more you will have access to advanced research.
Tasty mead is brewed in the brewery and: Tasty mead is brewed in the brewery and later quaffed by the soldiers during their celebrations. These drinks make your soldiers braver and stronger when attacking others. Different brews served cause different effects on your troops.
A potent blend brewed for berserk fury. Your warriors march with unmatched aggression, gaining +20% attack power. But in their drunken rage, catapult no longer aim accurately and chiefs lose 50% of their persuasive edge
Catapult may only target random building: Catapult may only target random buildings
A strong ale that stirs courage without: A strong ale that stirs courage without clouding aim. Your armies gain a solid +10% attack, while siege weapons remain steady. Chiefs, however, still stumble over their words, reducing their effectiveness by 50%.
Catapult retain ability to target specif: Catapult retain ability to target specific buildings
A refined brew favored by chieftains. Gr: A refined brew favored by chieftains. Grants a modest +5% attack boost, sharpens tongues for loyalty speeches, but leaves catapult operators too cheerful to aim straight.
This section provides detailed informati: This section provides detailed information about building upgrades, including the resource costs and the time required to reach each level. Use the tabs below to explore how upgrades impact both your economy and strategy.
This section displays the resource costs: This section displays the resource costs required to upgrade a building at each level. It includes a breakdown of wood, clay, iron, and wheat needed for each level from 1 upward.
This section displays the time required: This section displays the time required to upgrade a building at each level, with consideration of the level of your Main Building, artifacts and any other building duration reduction effects.
With a level 10 {{mainBuilding}} you are: With a level 10 {{mainBuilding}} you are able to downgrade or demolish a building. You cannot downgrade or demolish buildings which are currently being upgraded.
Name cannot be longer than 30 characters: Name cannot be longer than 30 characters
Rename current village. Name cannot exce: Rename current village. Name cannot exceed 30 characters.
Improvement cost and duration for level: Improvement cost and duration for level {{level}}
You need to research {{unitName}} at the: You need to research {{unitName}} at the <4></4> before you can begin training
Select the amount of units to train: Select the amount of units to train
Select the type and number of units to t: Select the type and number of units to train. Once queued, units will be trained one at a time, in the order you queued them in.
Next oasis slot available at Hero's mans: Next oasis slot available at Hero's mansion level {{heroMansionLevelRequirement}}
A village can occupy an oasis if it atta: A village can occupy an oasis if it attacks the oasis and subdues all the animals that are present. The attack must also include a hero, who must survive the attack. The oasis will only be captured if there is a level 10, 15 or 20 hero's mansion built in the attacking village, and can still have an empty oasis slot (1 on level 10, 2 on level 15 and 3 on level 20).
Occupied oasis provide a resource produc: Occupied oasis provide a resource production bonus of either 25% or 50% to one or multiple resources. If you choose to abandon an oasis, the abandoned oasis will start to regenerate animals.
For an oasis to be occupiable, it has to: For an oasis to be occupiable, it has to be in a radius of 3 squares around your village. To successfully occupy an oasis, you have to have an empty oasis slot available.
The main building is the administrative: The main building is the administrative center of your village. From here, you can rename your village and manage its infrastructure. If needed, you can also demolish existing buildings to make room for new development or restructure your layout.
Buy resources from nearby players and fi: Buy resources from nearby players and filter offers to match your needs. Select the resource you’re searching for by clicking its button. The same applies when choosing what you want to offer.
The smithy improves the attack and defen: The smithy improves the attack and defence values of troops by 1.5% per upgrade. Only researched units can be improved. Upgrades are limited by current smithy level, up to max level of 20. If you choose to demolish your smithy, you will not lose the upgrades to your troops. Each smithy can only work on 1 upgrade at the time, but multiple smithies may work on multiple level upgrades for the same unit at the same time.
